A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm a childhood Star Wars fan and I've usually found ways to enjoy most of the movies up to this point. I was surprised that I could find none for this one. I still can't believe this movie is what it is. Terrible. Unfortunately it leaves little room to turn back for future installments in the franchise. In fact the movie is destructive to what made Star Wars great and what potential could possibly follow in its wake.
